message.body: Hey. I was just looking at my calendar and that weekend that Mike will be here in August. The 23rd is that Saturday. I can take off if we decide to go to the beach. I don't know why I thought I was going to take off the following week. I'm just already off because of labor day.
I don't think that would work cause mike is going home on Saturday. I was thinking Saturday but I keep forgetting that's when he's leaving. I think he's leaving at like 4 or something.
Oooh. Right. You did say that. I forgot. Man. What day would be better then?
It would have to the middle of the week but I don't want to make you and Michael take off work.

Yeah. I know. One day I could do. But I don't know about two. Really, it just comes down to me wanting to save days if I really need them so I will see. I can ask Michael. He's off probation this month I think. So he can start using vacation days in August. He'll probably say yes. Haha.
Oooh. I have off on Tuesday the 19th since I'm working that Saturday. So I can take off on that Monday to make it Monday into Tuesday. If that works.
I just really want a pool!! It would be nice to make this work.
I'm in Washington until Tuesday. And we'll be getting back around 2.
Ugh.
It doesn't have to be that week. It doesn't have to be days that mike is down. At this point, I just wanna go!
Yeah. I know. Just need to find a way to get there. It's weird with phuong and I don't trust Dan
*Sam
Haha. I was thinking "who's dan?" Yeah...I don't really trust someone who NEVER offers. It's weird. And every time I say something she says "no one asked me to drive." Very strange.
Haha. Very true. Haha.

But I know what you mean. Ahh. Why doesn't this work? Haha. Mike and I are able to go Tuesday (when we get back), Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday. Assuming I can get a car, which hopefully will work out.
Ok. Let me ask Michael if he can or will take two days off. If he says ok. I'll do the same. Maybe Thursday and Friday.
Okie dokie!
And where do you want to go?
Ah! I don't know! Haha. Didn't even cross my mind. I guess I don't know what places are nice to stay in down the shore because I never really have before.

Hah. Okay. Well if we go to AC there's a groupon for a hotel right on the boardwalk that's $79 a night. I just have to make sure that it's possible to do one night cause it says it's for 4 nights but I don't know if it's up to 4 nights.
It's not a fancy hotel, but it's pretty nice. Mike and I stayed here senior year.
We can do fancier ones, but they'll cost more. It might not be bad for one night though. Doesn't matter to me.
Ok. Cool. That's like 20 bucks per person. Let me know about the stipulations.
What's it called?
Okay. I'll actually call them when maddie and Sid take a nap. Atlantic palace suites.
Ok. Thanks.
